name: UFO Blocks
description:
It's another day on the job at the block factory, and the blocks just keep on coming! Use your trusty tractor beam to pick up blocks and place them somewhere else. Match three in a row of the same type to remove them. Try to chain together combos, but be sure to move quickly- if the blocks reach the top, it's game over!

Special thanks to Charcoal for testing the game before release and providing feedback.
